sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import {IoChevronUpOutline, IoChevronDownOutline, IoEllipsisHorizontal, IoLocationSharp} from 'react-icons/io5'; function ListView() { const [likes, setLikes] = useState(0); const jodels = [ { color: "#3e9cbf", channel: "@Main", time: "32s", text: "This fake Jodel sucks! What is this bullshit!?", hashtag: "#COPYCAT", likes: likes, location: "Pori" }, { color: "#a7ecf2", channel: "@Main", time: "1m", text: "Mitä tehdä Porissa perjantai iltana?", hashtag: "#Missämeno", likes: likes, location: "Kokemäki" }, { color: "#f2c43d", channel: "@Haaga-Helia", time: "5m", text: "Haaga-Helian tikot, älkää ottako vaatimusmäärittelykurssii", hashtag: "", likes: likes, location: "Karkku" }, { color: "#f17c37", channel: "@Main", time: "1h", text: "Siis OMG kävin just ekaa kertaa salilla, ja siis se salin hottis työntekijä jäbä katteli mua.", hashtag: "#Salimake", likes: -4, location: "Harjavalta" }, { color: "#f26d50", channel: "@opiskelu", time: "3h", text: "Kuinka jaksatte opiskella kursseja jotka ei kiinnosta? Jeesiä kaivataan...", hashtag: "#studentlief", likes: 0, location: "Humppila" }, ] function onPressUpvote() { setLikes(likes + 1); } return(
{ jodels.map((jodel) => (

{jodel.location}

{jodel.channel}

{jodel.time}

{jodel.text}


{jodel.hashtag}

setLikes(3)}/>

{jodel.likes}

)) }
) } export default ListView;
